recipesJson.name: Miami Vice
recipesJson.author: ID10-T
recipesJson.description: A cocktail that's half pi√±a colada, half strawberry daiquiri, and all good. This one's for you, Thadentman, and if it doesn't meet your expectations, let me know and I'll go back to the lab again. It needs about 3 days to come together. If you add Koolada, go a little easier than you normally would.

reviews.text: Very intricate, You can taste all notes and what a great job with balancing this recipe. Thank you so much for this, it means alot
